Freddie Heather is an ecological modeller with research interests in understanding human impacts on marine ecosystems. He is a post-doc in the Fish Size Project at the Institute for Marine and Antarctic Studies at the University of Tasmania.

Education

Ph.D., University of Tasmania - 2021 (Quantitative Marine Science)

MBiolSci, University of Sheffield - 2014 (Biology)

Experience

Postdoc, University of Tasmania - current (Marine ecology)

Postdoc, University of Tasmania - 2022 (Reef ecology)
